Text: This works, however, yu cannot save the game... Don't reccomend it until its re uploaded with a save feature.

Looked it up on Timber and Stone forum... This updates save feature is messed up. The version has to be v0.1.2b. http://www.timberandstonegame.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=1196&p=12139&hilit=Saving#p12139
